errors.error_description: Changed Poetry version requirement from >=1.4.0 to <1.4.0, creating version compatibility issues
Added reference to non-existent config/service_config.yaml file without proper context or creation instructions
correction_candidates: Remove the reference to config/service_config.yaml file
Create the config/service_config.yaml file in the setup instructions
Change the reference to service.yaml file instead
Add instructions on how to generate the config/service_config.yaml file
errors.golden_answer: Remove the reference to config/service_config.yaml file
